query.sql: select owner, object_name, object_type, role as granted_role from sys.all_code_role_privs where owner = :OBJECT_OWNER and object_name = :OBJECT_NAME and object_type = case :OBJECT_TYPE when 'PACKAGE' then 'PACKAGE' when 'PACKAGE BODY' then 'PACKAGE' when 'FUNCTION' then 'FUNCTION' when 'PROCEDURE' then 'PROCEDURE' end order by role
select 'Code based access control (CBAC) requires Oracle 12.1 or higher' as "Unavailable feature" from dual where :OBJECT_OWNER is not null and :OBJECT_NAME is not null and :OBJECT_TYPE is not null
